Common Ignore Patterns


A regular expression that matches common filenames that we want to ignore

Install

npm

  • Install: npm install --save ignorepatterns
  • Require: require('ignorepatterns')

Editions

This package is published with the following editions:

  • ignorepatterns aliases ignorepatterns/index.js which uses Editions to automatically select the correct edition for the consumers environment
  • ignorepatterns/source/index.ts is typescript source code with import for modules
  • ignorepatterns/edition-node-13/index.js is typescript compiled for node.js 13 with require for modules
  • ignorepatterns/edition-node-0.12/index.js is typescript compiled for node.js 0.12 with require for modules

Usage 

var ignored = require('ignorepatterns').test('.DS_Store')
console.log(ignored) // true
